(a)  
Sec 13(b)(14)
exempts from the OT provisions of the FLSA "any employee employed within
the area of production (as defined by the Secretary) by an establishment
commonly recognized as a country elevator, including such an establishment
which sells products and services used in the operation of a farm, if no more
than five employees are employed in the establishment in such operations". (b)  WH’s position with regard to this
exemption is set forth in IB 780, Subpart H, Sections .700-.724. (c)  
The term
"area of production" is defined in Reg 536.3. This definition applies
to Sec 13(b)(14) of the amended Act.
html:
(a)   Sec 13(b)(14) exempts from the OT provisions of the FLSA "any employee employed within the area of production (as defined by the Secretary) by an establishment commonly recognized as a country elevator, including such an establishment which sells products and services used in the operation of a farm, if no more than five employees are employed in the establishment in such operations".

(b)  WH’s position with regard to this exemption is set forth in IB 780, Subpart H, Sections .700-.724.

(c)   The term "area of production" is defined in Reg 536.3. This definition applies to Sec 13(b)(14) of the amended Act.
